abstract_summ: A birth-and-death model for predicting the number of COVID-19 active cases has been proposed . The W-LSTM model developed in this study, performs better in terms of MSE, R2 and MAPE, as compared to the previously published models . Age groups, trade with China, air traffic, country temperature and CoV-2 virus types were identified as the likely effectors of infection and virulence leading to deaths .
